Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to apportionment of mortgage taxes for property situated in more than one tax district
Summary: Provides that the apportionment of mortgage taxes for property situated in more than one tax district shall be based upon the full market value estimate of the property covered by such mortgage.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to apportionment of mortgage taxes for property situated in more than one tax district
